title: [SOLVED] 820-00165 no video no chime
message:
Got this board with just 1 resistor bad R6125 (seems it was water damage just on 1 pin).

CHecked all resistors near U6100 and they are ok. When plug magsafe fan spins for 5 seconds than turns off and than spins again for ever.


CPU is getting warm, all rails are ok, i have vcore 1.8V, ALL SYS is 3.3V.  There is USB activity but there is no chime and video.


Any idea?

title: [SOLVED] 820-00165 no video no chime
message:
"There is USB activity"
Activity for sure, not just power?

Did you try external monitor?

title: [SOLVED] 820-00165 no video no chime
message:
On External monitor no signal.

think that just power on usb because usb with bootable os not flashing.

title: [SOLVED] 820-00165 no video no chime
message:
There are more SPI Bus Series Termination resistors; some of them under PCH area, faraway of U6100.
You must check the ones close to J6100, as all traces too.

Sometime, liquid damage on SPI area can cause BIOS corruption.

title: [SOLVED] 820-00165 no video no chime
message: already checked all resistor and traces near U6100 and also new EFI with same result. Fan spins for 5-6 seconds, shuts down and turn on again without chiming and image

title: [SOLVED] 820-00165 no video no chime
message:
Reball SMC.
If still the same, heat CPU with quality flux...

title: [SOLVED] 820-00165 no video no chime
message:
it was SMC. All clean near but have shit under chip. Now it is working fine. Thank you. 



What make u think it can be SMC?

title: [SOLVED] 820-00165 no video no chime
message:
Had liquid on SPI area, close enough to SMC.
I always recommend to reball SMC if detect liquid sign close to it.
Sometime need to reball it even if no visible signs on its area...
